name: Exercício 5 - Lista 8
body:
**EXERCÍCIO 5 LISTA 8**

**Aluna: Thaís Fernanda Godoy**

-------------
**Códigos no RStudio:**

* Mouse
```javascript
library(qtl)
# CSV format
dat2 <- read.cross("csv", dir="E:/", "mouse_qtl_1-2.csv")
out.mr <- scanone(dat2, method="mr")
out.mr
plot(out.mr, ylab="LOD score")
```

* Maize
```javascript
library(qtl)
# CSV format
dat2 <- read.cross("csv", dir="E:/ESALQ/", "fenotipo_maize.csv")
out.mr <- scanone(dat2, method="mr")
out.mr
plot(out.mr, ylab="LOD score")
```
